org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka

Class KafkaMessageChannelBinder

    public class KafkaMessageChannelBinder
extends AbstractMessageChannelBinder<ExtendedConsumerProperties<org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.properties.KafkaConsumerProperties>,ExtendedProducerProperties<org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.properties.KafkaProducerProperties>,org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.provisioning.KafkaTopicProvisioner>
implements ExtendedPropertiesBinder<org.springframework.messaging.MessageChannel,org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.properties.KafkaConsumerProperties,org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.properties.KafkaProducerProperties>
    A Binder that uses Kafka as the underlying middleware.
    Author:
    Eric Bottard, Marius Bogoevici, Ilayaperumal Gopinathan, David Turanski, Gary Russell, Mark Fisher, Soby Chacko, Henryk Konsek, Doug Saus

      • createProducerMessageHandler

        protected org.springframework.messaging.MessageHandler createProducerMessageHandler(ProducerDestination destination,
                                                                                    ExtendedProducerProperties<org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.properties.KafkaProducerProperties> producerProperties,
                                                                                    org.springframework.messaging.MessageChannel errorChannel)
                                                                             throws Exception
        Description copied from class: AbstractMessageChannelBinder
        Creates a MessageHandler with the ability to send data to the target middleware. If the returned instance is also a Lifecycle, it will be stopped automatically by the binder.

        In order to be fully compliant, the MessageHandler of the binder must observe the following headers:

        • BinderHeaders.PARTITION_HEADER - indicates the target partition where the message must be sent

        Specified by:
        createProducerMessageHandler in class AbstractMessageChannelBinder<ExtendedConsumerProperties<org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.properties.KafkaConsumerProperties>,ExtendedProducerProperties<org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.properties.KafkaProducerProperties>,org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.provisioning.KafkaTopicProvisioner>
        Parameters:
        destination - the name of the target destination
        producerProperties - the producer properties
        errorChannel - the error channel (if enabled, otherwise null). If not null, the binder must wire this channel into the producer endpoint so that errors are forwarded to it.
        Returns:
        the message handler for sending data to the target middleware
        Throws:
        Exception

        Description copied from class: AbstractMessageChannelBinder
        Creates MessageProducer that receives data from the consumer destination. will be started and stopped by the binder.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        destination - reference to the consumer destination
        group - the consumer group
        extendedConsumerProperties - the consumer properties
        Returns:
        the consumer endpoint.

      • getErrorMessageStrategy

        protected org.springframework.integration.support.ErrorMessageStrategy getErrorMessageStrategy()
        Description copied from class: AbstractMessageChannelBinder
        Binders can return an ErrorMessageStrategy for building error messages; binder implementations typically might add extra headers to the error message.
        Overrides:
        getErrorMessageStrategy in class AbstractMessageChannelBinder<ExtendedConsumerProperties<org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.properties.KafkaConsumerProperties>,ExtendedProducerProperties<org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.properties.KafkaProducerProperties>,org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.provisioning.KafkaTopicProvisioner>
        Returns:
        the implementation - may be null.

      • getErrorMessageHandler

        protected org.springframework.messaging.MessageHandler getErrorMessageHandler(ConsumerDestination destination,
                                                                              String group,
                                                                              ExtendedConsumerProperties<org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.properties.KafkaConsumerProperties> properties)
        Description copied from class: AbstractMessageChannelBinder
        Binders can return a message handler to be subscribed to the error channel. Examples might be if the user wishes to (re)publish messages to a DLQ.
        Overrides:
        getErrorMessageHandler in class AbstractMessageChannelBinder<ExtendedConsumerProperties<org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.properties.KafkaConsumerProperties>,ExtendedProducerProperties<org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.properties.KafkaProducerProperties>,org.springframework.cloud.stream.binder.kafka.provisioning.KafkaTopicProvisioner>
        Parameters:
        destination - the destination.
        group - the group.
        properties - the properties.
        Returns:
        the handler (may be null, which is the default, causing the exception to be rethrown).
